name: Youtube Transcript Summarizer
description: Creates concise summaries of YouTube videos using their transcripts and LLM processing. Supports multiple languages
author: @@eduardosotomontaner.arb-sep-shinkai

url.description: Full YouTube video URL or ID. Must be public video with available transcript

lang.description: Two-letter language code for transcript (en, es, etc). Default: auto-detect from video

summary.description: The generated summary of the video
